duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and perform high volume customer banking transactions with accuracy.
Educate customers on new technology and develop banking product referral opportunities through strong customer relationship skills.
Identify banking opportunities during customer interactions and make appropriate referrals to branch staff or PNC ecosystem partners.
Perform lobby engagement activities to connect with customers and position PNC products to meet their needs.
Educate customers on options for managing financial transactions by leveraging technology, tools, and resources.
Solve customer problems using product and procedural knowledge.
Adhere to all policies and procedures, demonstrating sound judgment within established limits.
Ensure teller and branch daily operations and maintenance transactions are completed in an efficient and accurate manner.

education_certification.credential: No Degree required. Prior experience is not required. In lieu of a degree, a comparable combination of education, job specific certification(s), and experience (including military service) may be considered.
